item.title: iLabAfrica WAZIHUB Bootcamp
item.description: The @iLabAfrica WAZIHUB Bootcamp took place from 12th to 16th November 2018 at the @iLabAfrica Research Centre, located in Strathmore University in Nairobi, Kenya.

item.title: iLabAfrica WAZIHUB Bootcamp

item.title: Wazihub Bootcamp in Kumasi
item.description: One of several WAZIHUB IoT Bootcamps dubbed “Wazihub IoT Weekend” was held on Saturday 23rd July 2018 in Kumasi, Ghana.

item.title: Wazihub Bootcamp in Kumasi

item.title: WAZIHUB Redbull Hackathon
item.description: Redbull Commissioned The MakerSpace to help them deliver a tech component to their Innovation Festival.

item.title: WAZIHUB Redbull Hackathon
item.description: Redbull Commissioned The MakerSpace to help them deliver a tech component to their Innovation Festival.

item.title: WAZIHUB Launched in Kampala, Uganda
item.description: WAZIHUB, an Internet of Things Innovation program, launched today in Kampala, Uganda, as a collaborative problem solving and innovative approach to foster creation of IoT products and services. The launch took place at HiveColab, one of the consortium partners based in Sub-Saharan Africa. HiveColab is an innovation hub and startup incubator in Kampala.

item.title: WAZIHUB Launched in Kampala, Uganda
item.description: WAZIHUB, an Internet of Things Innovation program, launched today in Kampala, Uganda, as a collaborative problem solving and innovative approach to foster creation of IoT products and services. The launch took place at HiveColab, one of the consortium partners based in Sub-Saharan Africa. HiveColab is an innovation hub and startup incubator in Kampala.

item.title: Join Africa’s community for IOT enthusiasts!
item.description:
Join Africa’s community for IOT enthusiasts!

Most Start-ups in Africa do not have the funds to develop competitive solutions for the go-to market that requires seed funds and technical training. The innovative projects are barely sustainable, often collapsing before project completion date.
